name: monster mess
description:
A short puzzlescript game about cleaning up after a monster and then trying to trap them so they can't make any more mess.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=d3e36523514fe4c3077e63d9ad4fdfa5

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=d3e36523514fe4c3077e63d9ad4fdfa5

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
